snippet.title: Dealhacker: Get 10GB Data From Kogan Mobile For $19.90 A Month
snippet.content:
Kogan Mobile has slashed 40 per cent off the price of its 10GB 90 day prepaid plan for new customers. This works out to just $19.90 per month. You can also get 40 per cent off its 14GB 90 day prepaid plan, bringing the total to $26.90 per month. Here are the details.
From today, Kogan is offering its and to new customers for $19.90 per month and $26.90 per month, respectively.
Both plans come with the aforementioned data allowances, plus unlimited standard national calls and texts. (Personal Use and Fair Use policy apply.) Standard calls include standard national fixed lines, standard national mobiles, calls to 13, 1300 and 18 numbers and calls to voicemail.
Note that this is a one-time offer - unfortunately, the discount does not apply to subsequent recharges and only new customers can apply. The deal ends August 17.
[]
